OK.  I just sent an email requesting those vital info on scenario file 
formats.  
There were a few things I conceded about building a new program:  
  There would probably have to be password protection on said program 
similiar to the original.  Zipped file requires a pssword to unzip.
  If there was legal documents to be signed to create a new scenario 
editor, all involved in creating a new one would have to sign 
documents.
